```lisp
(:action collect
    :parameters (?item - object ?l - location)
    :precondition (and
      (at ?item ?l)
      (not (collected ?item))
    )
    :effect (and
      (collected ?item)
      (not (at ?item ?l))
    )
)

(:action buy_papyrus
    :parameters (?npc - agent ?p - papyrus)
    :precondition (and 
      (not (obtained ?p)) 
      (not (knowledge ?p))
    )
    :effect (and 
      (obtained ?p) 
      (knowledge ?p)
    )
)

(:action buy
    :parameters (?npc - agent ?item - object)
    :precondition (and 
      (not (obtained ?item)) 
      (not (knowledge ?item))
    )
    :effect (and 
      (obtained ?item) 
      (knowledge ?item)
    )
)

(:action make
    :parameters (?npc - agent ?resource - object ?location - place)
    :precondition (and 
      (obtained ?resource) 
      (not (knowledge ?location)) 
      (not (made ?resource))
    )
    :effect (and 
      (knowledge ?location) 
      (made ?resource)
    )
)
```
